item.title: Triumph Financial Inc 10-K
item.description: Triumph Financial Inc, which is in the State Commercial Banks [6022] industry, SEC 10-K filing on February 15, 2023 had 64769 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: financial - 654 instances company - 631 instances 31 - 611 instances december - 601 instances loans - 542 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
